name: Ultimate-movie-guide
tagline: Generate OMDB/IMDB information offline page for the Movie
body: # Ultimate Movie Guide ## Generate OMDB/IMDB information offline page for the Movie You have bunch of movies on the harddisk and need to browse the information online for individual movie, wait this guide will help you to generate this information offline with OMDB APIs 1. Generates offline information page with title, poster, IMDB rating and genre ## Download Binary Download Binary ## TODOS 1. Generate info pages for media files 2. Correct dirty folder names to get correct movie name
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
